version_description:
• New streamlined Alerts Center
• Sector Performance added to Markets
• Company Profile included in Stock Quotes
• Total Account Value & Pending Activity added to Positions

• New streamlined Alerts Center
• Sector Performance added to Markets
• Company Profile included in Stock Quotes
• Total Account Value & Pending Activity added to Positions
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes

• Check your balances and custom feed before logging in with Quick Access
• View articles and videos in our newly enhanced Learning Center 
• Access analyst ratings, top holdings, and more on ETF quotes

• Check your balances and custom feed before logging in with Quick Access
• View articles and videos in our newly enhanced Learning Center 
• Access analyst ratings, top holdings, and more on ETF quotes

• Open a Fidelity Go℠ account, or learn more about this easy way to invest
• View articles and videos in our newly enhanced Learning Center

• Open a Fidelity Go℠ account, or learn more about this easy way to invest
• View articles and videos in our newly enhanced Learning Center

• Choose which accounts and watch lists appear in your Feed
• Mask your account numbers for enhanced security
• Leverage third-party fundamental research from Trefis
• Get Recognia™ technical sentiment for three different trading horizons for stocks and ETFs
• See how a company is trending on social media with Social Market Analytics Social Sentiment score
• Use the new ETF screener to help generate investing ideas 
• New performance enhancements to address Watch complications

• Choose which accounts and watch lists appear in your Feed
• Mask your account numbers for enhanced security
• Leverage third-party fundamental research from Trefis
• Get Recognia™ technical sentiment for three different trading horizons for stocks and ETFs
• See how a company is trending on social media with Social Market Analytics Social Sentiment score
• Use the new ETF screener to help generate investing ideas 
• New performance enhancements to address Watch complications
• Manage your Fidelity® Visa Signature® credit card account
• Manage your Fidelity® Visa Signature® credit card account

• Send quotes and market data via the iMessage app
• Visit Orders by Fidelity Customers in Research to get Buy/Sell Ratios on customers’ most actively traded stocks and ETFs
• Visit Feed Preferences to further customize your Feed
• View more account balance details in your Feed

Thank you for using the Fidelity Mobile® App. We’re committed to making ongoing updates to improve your experience, so visit often to see the latest features and enhancements. 
 
• Send quotes and market data via the iMessage app

Thank you for using the Fidelity Mobile® App. Our Fidelity Mobile® App is now optimized for iPad, including:
• Improved design and navigation 
• Customized Feed, with information tailored to your investments and interests 
• Enhanced Accounts section, with summary information and a consolidated activity tab 
• Updated Watch Lists and research experience

Thank you for using the Fidelity Mobile® App. Our Fidelity Mobile® App is now optimized for iPad, including:
• Improved design and navigation 
• Customized Feed, with information tailored to your investments and interests 
• Enhanced Accounts section, with summary information and a consolidated activity tab 
• Updated Watch Lists and research experience

Thank you for using the Fidelity Mobile® App . We’re committed to making ongoing updates to improve your experience. Check back often to learn more about the latest features and enhancements.

Thank you for using the Fidelity Mobile® App. With the latest version, you can now:

• Utilize Face ID for authentication on the iPhone X
• Make smarter decisions about your money. We’ve added 6 new interactive programs to the Learning Center.

Your feedback helps us improve your experience through ongoing updates. Let us know what you think of this update by writing a review in the App Store.

Check back often to learn more about the latest features and enhancements.

Thank you for using the Fidelity Mobile® App. The latest version includes:
A dropdown in the Accounts section that allows users to easily switch between accounts while remaining on the same tab.
When viewing account-specific data, we now pre-fill trades with the selected account rather than always loading the default account.
Enhancements to the way we perform TouchID and FaceID authentication.
Your feedback helps us improve your experience through ongoing updates. Let us know what you think by writing a review.

Thank you for using the Fidelity Mobile® App. The latest version includes:

Fidelity Private Client GroupSM and Fidelity Premium ServicesSM clients working with an advisor can now access their advisor’s Calendar to self-schedule an appointment, Digital Bio, Phone number, Email address, and Support team number for immediate 24/7 service help.
Bug Fixes and Performance Enhancements

Thank you for using the Fidelity® Mobile App. The latest version includes:

• Manage your email preferences

• Resources for life events now available

• View spending limits and manage your debit card from Accounts

• Dark Mode is now supported for iOS 13 enabling you to adopt an all dark theme across the
app. To turn on Dark Mode on your device, open your Settings app > Display & Brightness > and select "Dark".

• You can schedule an appointment with your existing advisor through the Virtual Assistant

• Bug fixes and performance enhancements

Thank you for using the Fidelity Mobile® App. The latest version includes:

• View your IRA contribution progress for your Traditional, Rollover and Roth IRAs.
• Review your profile information without leaving the app, including contact information, beneficiaries, and authorized access.
• For Premium and Private Client Group clients working with a Fidelity advisor, see and manage upcoming appointments.
• View account number and routing number information.
• Bug fixes and enhancements.

Thank you for using the Fidelity® Mobile App. The latest version includes:

• Expanded money transfers to support more account types. You can now make a deposit into your HSA, ABLE or SEP IRA account, and withdraw from your HSA, ABLE or 529 College Savings account.
• FWS goal-based clients can now see their goals on the feed.
• PPA customers can now contact and schedule appointments with their coaching team on the feed.
• You can now exclude accounts when looking at your net worth, creating a more personalized view. When you’re ready to add any of these accounts back in, you can do that with a single click. We’ve also added a new visualization feature to give you a quick look of your assets and liabilities.
• Bug Fixes and performance enhancements.

Your feedback helps us improve your experience through ongoing updates. Let us know what you think by writing a review.

Thank you for using the Fidelity® Mobile App. The latest version includes:

• Expanded money transfers to support more account types. You can now make a deposit into your HSA, ABLE or SEP IRA account, and withdraw from your HSA, ABLE or 529 College Savings account.
• FWS goal-based clients can now see their goals on the feed.
• PPA customers can now contact and schedule appointments with their coaching team on the feed.
• You can now exclude accounts when looking at your net worth, creating a more personalized view. When you’re ready to add any of these accounts back in, you can do that with a single click. We’ve also added a new visualization feature to give you a quick look of your assets and liabilities.
• Bug Fixes and performance enhancements.
